chunks.lyrics: Transcribed by Aidan (hairhockey@hotmail.com) Words and Music by Pillar
Gtr I (C G C F A D) - 'light distortion 1'
Gtr II (C G C F A D) - 'Light Distortion 2'
Gtr III (C G C F A D) - 'Heavy Distortion'
There are a couple of effects at the beginning but I didn?t know how to tab them. I
just a couple of volume swells.
This does NOT include the bass part, so I don?t have the riff that the bass plays during
If you only have one guitar I would play the guitar 3 part
After playing this, go back to the chorus and play it through twice
Guitar two plays in playing the harmony along with guitar 3, its barely audible, and It
The accompaniment is guitar 3 part in the chorus.
r - bend release (if no number after the r, then release immediately)
\n/ - tremolo bar dip; n = amount to dip
= - hold bend; also acts as connecting device for hammers/pulls
x - on rhythm slash represents muted slash
o - on rhythm slash represents single note slash
